title: IGN Entertainment - Video Game Guides Reviews News
description:
Are you actively playing Animal Crossing: New Horizons? We've made our Animal Crossing wiki guide easily accessible in the IGN app -- just swipe right!
IGN is your #1 source for video game news and reviews. A must-have app for gamers, movie buffs, and comic fans.
The app gives you fast and easy access to the latest news about your favorite video games, movies, and TV shows.
Try IGN’s Android app for FREE.
Features:
- Deciding which video game to buy? Find top games as rated by IGN’s professional editors.
- Deciding which game to play or movie to watch? Find video game and movie reviews.
- Looking for help getting through The Legend of Zelda, Grand Theft Auto, or Fortnite? Check out our comprehensive wiki guides and walkthroughs.
- Want to make games easy? Find cheats and codes for games like Grand Theft Auto.
- Looking for the latest video game or movie trailer? Watch it on IGN first, along with shows like the Daily Fix.
- Want to find the latest game reviews by console? Check out our latest PS4, Xbox One, and PC game reviews.

content_rating: Intense Violence, Blood and Gore, Suggestive Themes
